attributes.additional_details:
Save the eastbourne dgh
Eastbourne will now have the worst access in the UK in terms of the population access factor ( population x distance ). Eastbourne will be the largest discrete town in the UK without the standard range of core essential services.

And this is not right we all need to sign this e petition to stop these vital services going else where.

rejection.details: Please see: Save the Eastbourne DGH
